div.p: - Short Essay The article ‚ÄúThe Invention of Homosexuality and Heterosexuality‚Äù addresses how homosexuality was invented and how society accepted this new form of sexual orientation. If I could invent something new, I would like to develop a flying car. As we all know ‚ÄúNecessity is the creation need of all inventions‚Äù. Essentially, anything that did not exist previously, whether it is a mechanical device or art, literature, or music, is an "invention". Is the most important invention a tool, a mechanical gadget, a concept or an idea that impacted or improved humanity as a whole (in terms of evolution, a new way of thinking, and connectedness)?
